summary: This document appears to be a Proton Mail interface screenshot showing an email exchange about a Daily Mail article. The email discusses an article raising questions about Lord Mandelson's friendship with Jeffrey Epstein and notes that Mandelson has not been reported on before in this context.

persons.name: Daniel Bates
persons.context: Author of the email sharing a Daily Mail article link about Lord Mandelson and Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Lord Mandelson
persons.context: Subject of the Daily Mail article which questions his 10-year friendship with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Identified as a pedophile and the subject of the friendship discussed in the article.

connections.description: The Daily Mail article raises questions about their 10-year friendship.

events.title: Email exchange about Mandelson-Epstein article
events.description: An email is sent discussing a Daily Mail article about Lord Mandelson's friendship with Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: A Daily Mail article raises questions about Lord Mandelson's 10-year friendship with Jeffrey Epstein.
The email sender notes that Mandelson has not been reported on before in relation to Epstein.
The correspondence occurs via Proton Mail, an encrypted email service.
